channel.title: Item prices
channel.description: Hello, well i have an issue, my server is a PI i got a slayer shop which you buy items by spending slayer points but i want to add to the shop a bandos tassy that you can buy with slayer points but in the shopassistant there is already a bandos tassy which costs 1500 (of something) is it possible that i just crate another tassy id like this case 11724: return 100; will it cost 100 slayer points then? if anyone knows how i can make this please comment

item.title: Item prices
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Your assistant would have to know what shop its looking for if you have it selling in multiple places, with different values.
if (shopID==SLAYER_SHOP) return 1500;
else return 100;
etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Item prices
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Just change the 1500 to 100 or else it will recognize it as already stated. Since you don’t know what it’s 1500 of I wouldn’t worry about what you’re changing.

Read full topic

item.description:
